name: Love & Guillotines
description:
Love & Guillotines is a joke that Ellen Noel made one day while reading about the French Revolution and that I took entirely too far. Meet and seduce 9 well-known and integral members of French history in this short and silly dating sim that definitely received more effort than it deserved.

Script: Ellen Noel

Programming: Chilliac

Character Art: Emily Horne

Additional resources:

Florassence

CreaPracticus

Potat0Master

Leave a comment, and thank you for playing!
